uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.env.field

Class Soil

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.CompoundData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.models.dairy.env.field.Soil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, DataSet

    public class Soil
extends CompoundData
    Class representing field soil. Largely based on the STICS soil model
